content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can I assist you with plumbing, electrical, or HVAC services today?
It seems this message is not related to our home services. If you have a plumbing, electrical, or HVAC issue we can help with, please let us know.
Lowest prices for Viagra!!! Text now 555-000-0000
This number has been flagged for spam activity unrelated to our services. We will not be able to assist you further. Thank you.
reason: Customer identified as spammer based on irrelevant and unsolicited messages.
